participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and laid-back, enjoys relaxing activities and mental challenges.
participant_1.background: I love taking bubble baths. I am single and have two dogs. I do not drink alcohol. I like to play chess.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Candid and straightforward, with a taste for exotic foods.
participant_2.background: My name is George. I've zero family that I am close to. My favorite food is papaya. I married a super model from Italy.

content.text: Hi there! My name is George, what is your name?
